metadata.title: CVE-2022-36561 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: XPDF v4.0.4 was discovered to contain a segmentation violation via thecomponent /xpdf/AcroForm.cc:538.

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
